title: Wearable technology market share in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014 , by product
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis representing Wearable technology products, and a y axis representing Share of market.
The highest category is found at Health_and_fitness_trackers where Share of market is 39.0.
The lowest category is found at Smart_watches where Share of market is 11.0.
